attributes.action: funding for young people to get back to work
attributes.additional_details:
Funds should be availble for young people to get them into work.

The government paid for my security badge and now i am in work and have been for the past year. I have never had any time off sick.

Young people are the future of our society, therefore funding for them to take courses and get them back into work would be beneficial to help the economy and reduce unemployment!
